nodes.text: Tesuna was a male Human who served as a sergeant in the Galactic Republic army during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war, he worked as a stimulants merchant and operated a stall in Camp Talanis in the Gormak Lands on the planet Voss. Tesuna wore white armor while at his stall and made use of a datapad. He had fair skin and brown hair and eyes.

Tesuna first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic and Imperial heavy armor vendor on the planet Voss. His location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
